newsitem.title: POLAND: Lentex expects 1998 net up to PLN 17 mln.
newsitem.headline: Lentex expects 1998 net up to PLN 17 mln.

text.p: Polish carpet maker Lentex SA, which started bourse trade on Thursday, expects its net profit to rise to 17 million zlotys on 218-million-zloty sales in 1998, the company's president said on Thursday.
Last year the firm had a 11.5-million-zloty net on 139-million-zloty sales. It expects to earn 12 million zlotys on 150-million-zloty sales in 1997.
"We plan a major sales growth in 1998...sales of 218 million zlotys, and a net profit of 17 million zlotys," Franciszek Koszarek told a news conference.
